turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm I'm looking forward to getting picking up a nice cup of coffee, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One moment. Let me think about that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the most popular beverage on the Peet's menu?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i believe the golden caffe latte is their most popular drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. I'll I'll go with the cafe mocha, iced, please, with soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I'll have that to be a large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which pete's location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it to be the West Sunnyvale Shopping Center location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a large iced caffe mocha with soy milk and an extra shot of espresso to be picked up at the pete's on west sunnyvale shopping center, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. I'm super excited. Thank you kindly for your help today.
